item.description:
HI!
Although its hard to admit, the beautiful weather is quickly leaving us :( Therefore, this Sat we will be meeting at Doggie Day Playcenter at 10 am. Thank you all for coming to meet us at Peters Park it was a great summer!

Again, there is no fee for the meetups just a small donation to help cover the cost of the meetup.com
charges!

Thank you! See you Sat!

Meaghan and Todd
Jackie O & Kennedy
item.name: The Downtown Boston Maltese December Meetup
